name: Arcturus
details: Main Source: A Cosmic Awareness Channel from 'Revelations of Awareness' Issue # 371

name: Aryans (Blondes)
description: Blond Nordic Humanoids who work with the Greys. Sometimes captured by the Reptoids and have implants.
details: Main Source: A Cosmic Awareness Channel from 'Revelations of Awareness' Issue # 371

name: Blues (Star Warriors)
description: Translucent-skinned humanoids with large almond-shaped eyes who emphasize personal freedom.
details: Main Source: Post from Don Allen 'FILE: Star Warriors', Forwarded from 'contact' by Sande Van der Straten

name: Confederation of Humans
description: A collective of humanoid aliens dedicated to protecting humanity.
details: Main Source: A Cosmic Awareness Channel from 'Revelations of Awareness' Issue # 371

name: Greys
description: Small humanoid beings with large heads and black eyes, often associated with abductions.
details: Main Sources: Secret Life by David M. Jacobs, Communion by Whitley Strieber, 'Revelations of Awareness' Issue # 371

name: Orion Empire
description: A collective of negative-energy beings including Reptoids and Greys.
details: Main Source: A Cosmic Awareness Channel from 'Revelations of Awareness' Issue # 371

name: Pleiadians
description: A collective of loving, time-traveling extraterrestrials aiding humanity in spiritual growth.
details: Main Source: Information by Don, Connecting Link Magazine, Books by Billie Meier and Barbara Marciniak

name: Sirius
details: Main Source: A Cosmic Awareness Channel from 'Revelations of Awareness' Issue # 371

name: Reptoids
description: Reptilian conquerors who control the Greys and aim to conquer humanity.
details: Main Source: A Cosmic Awareness Channel from 'Revelations of Awareness' Issue # 371

name: Vega
details: Main Source: A Cosmic Awareness Channel from 'Revelations of Awareness' Issue # 371
